Name: Notetaking for Seminars
Author: tomha
Description: Notetaking Template for research seminars. Includes section for class notes to be typed or transcribed, overall notes on the subject, notes on individual readings, questions, and comments. Copy the Paper 1 Subsection for additional readings. Readings section includes sections for figures, tables, and graphs, summary, research question, novel data/methods, original contribution, outline, questions raised.
